thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kudelski Says ‍Operating Income Excl Restructuring Costs At USD 48.1 Million In 2017​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kudelski Says ‍Operating Income Excl Restructuring Costs At USD 48.1 Million In 2017​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - KUDELSKI SA:
* ‍OUTLOOK FOR 2018: REVENUES IN LINE WITH 2017, OPERATING INCOME USD 30-45 MILLION BEFORE RESTRUCTURING COSTS​
* ‍PROPOSING A CASH DISTRIBUTION (DIVIDEND) OF CHF 0.10 PER BEARER SHARE​
* FY CONSOLIDATED REVENUES AND OTHER OPERATING INCOME FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS UP BY 7.1% TO USD 1‘068.7 MILLION​
* ‍OPERATING INCOME EXCLUDING RESTRUCTURING COSTS DECREASED FROM USD 113.5 MILLION TO USD 48.1 MILLION IN 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
